title: Backend Intern (Python/AWS)
description: Build and test serverless functions on AWS. Work with API Gateway, Lambda, and DynamoDB.

title: AI/ML Intern (RAG/NLP)
description: Prototype a retrieval-augmented generation workflow on AWS using Bedrock embeddings and OpenSearch k-NN; evaluate retrieval quality.

title: Data Engineering Intern (ETL/Athena)
description: Ingest raw CSV/JSON to S3, transform with AWS Glue jobs, and expose queryable datasets through Athena.

title: DevOps Intern (CI/CD & IaC)
description: Build CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions, containerize apps, and deploy to ECS using Terraform/CDK.

title: Frontend Intern (React + AWS)
description: Create a React SPA, host on S3 behind CloudFront, integrate Cognito auth and call serverless APIs.

title: MLOps Intern (SageMaker Pipelines)
description: Implement training/evaluation pipelines on SageMaker, track experiments, and set up model monitoring.

title: Cloud Security Intern
description: Harden AWS accounts with IAM least privilege, enable KMS encryption, and build compliance dashboards.

title: SRE Intern (Monitoring & Resilience)
description: Define SLOs, set CloudWatch alarms/dashboards, trace requests with X-Ray, and implement auto-healing.

title: Full-Stack Intern (Serverless)
description: Build serverless REST/queues with API Gateway, Lambda, DynamoDB, SQS/SNS, and Step Functions.

title: Generative AI Intern (Document Intelligence)
description: Use Textract to parse PDFs, Bedrock for embeddings and Claude prompts, and generate insights from documents.
